preface.title: Preface
preface.para: SymmetricDS is an open-source, web-enabled, database independent, data synchronization software application. It uses web and database technologies to replicate tables between relational databases in near real time. The software was designed to scale for a large number of databases, work across low-bandwidth connections, and withstand periods of network outages.
This User Guide introduces SymmetricDS and its uses for data synchronization. It is intended for users who want to be quickly familiarized with the software, configure it, and use its many features.
